## defineMerklizedRootPosition variable

Returns merklized root position based on schema serialization metadata and expected position

**Signature:**

```typescript
defineMerklizedRootPosition: (metadata?: SchemaMetadata, position?: MerklizedRootPosition) => MerklizedRootPosition
```
